name: VIBEZ - Full Autolayout UI Kit
description:
Vibez is the styleguide for your next web design project, keeping the good vibes and autolayout together.


This is a live file so it will be maintained monthly, adding new components and tweaks here and there.


Current components for v1 include:

  • Cards (with tons of variants)
  • Badges
  • Tags
  • Buttons
  • Text fields
  • Checkboxes, switches and radio buttons.
  • Banners
  • Chips
  • Header
  • Tooltips
  • Progress bar


made by alejandraramirez.me, stay tuned for more!
